Paragraph: 22 From the onset oxidation and reduction potentials in the cyclic voltammogram , energy levels of HOMO and LUMO can be readily estimated , which correspond to ionization potential ( IP ) and electron affinity ( EA ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| LUMO energy levels |

Paragraph: 22 From the onset oxidation and reduction potentials in the cyclic voltammogram , energy levels of HOMO and LUMO can be readily estimated , which correspond to ionization potential ( IP ) and electron affinity ( EA ) , respectively.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| ionization potential (IP) |
| electron affinity (EA) |

Note: HOMO and LUMO stand for Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital and Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital, respectively, which are molecular properties related to the electronic structure of a material.
